tables.table_schema: CREATE TABLE ethical_frameworks ( id INT PRIMARY KEY, framework_name STRING, description STRING, created_date TIMESTAMP, researcher_id INT );
CREATE TABLE ar_development_projects ( project_id INT PRIMARY KEY, project_name STRING, start_date DATE, end_date DATE, lead_researcher_id INT, ethics_review_status STRING );

CREATE TABLE AR_Development (
    Project_ID INT PRIMARY KEY,
    Researcher_ID INT NOT NULL,
    Ethicist_ID INT NOT NULL,
    Framework_ID INT NOT NULL,
    Start_Date DATE NOT NULL,
    End_Date DATE NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Collaborations (
  collaboration_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  ethicist_id INT,
  researcher_id INT,
  project_id INT,
  framework_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (ethicist_id) REFERENCES Ethicists(ethicist_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (researcher_id) REFERENCES Researchers(researcher_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES AR_Development(project_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (framework_id) REFERENCES Ethical_Frameworks(framework_id)
);
